QuestData.Title: Mushan Mastery: Darkhide
QuestData.Description: My boy here is a talented hunter... in training. Let's show him an old 'Nessy style hunt shall we?$b$bI saw a mighty big mushan east of here with a hide dark as night. It looked like it had taken down a number of hunters in its day.$b$bIf you want a big game hunt, go try an' take it on.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that's a proper trophy right there.
